id: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm_DSTungLoaiThietBi

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
    tb.id AS id_thiet_bi,
    tb.ten_thiet_bi,
    ltb.ten_loai_thiet_bi,
    dv.ten_don_vi,
    tb.nhom,
    tb.cap_trang_bi,
    tb.tinh_trang,
    qn.ten_quan_nhan,
    qn.quan_ham,
    qn.chuc_vu,
    qn.so_dien_thoai
FROM 
    public.e_thiet_bi_mang tb
LEFT JOIN 
    public.loai_thiet_bi ltb ON tb.loai_thiet_bi_id = ltb.id
LEFT JOIN 
    public.don_vi dv ON tb.don_vi_id = dv.id
LEFT JOIN 
    public.quan_nhan qn ON tb.quanh_nhan_id = qn.id
WHERE 
    1=1
    {{ ChartLoai.selectedDataPoint ? `AND  ltb.ten_loai_thiet_bi= '${ChartLoai.selectedDataPoint.rawEventData.name}'` : '' }}
ORDER BY 
    tb.id;

unpublishedAction.name: DSTungLoaiThietBi
unpublishedAction.pageId: Quán lý vũ khí trang bị Cụm
